meanings.definition: A person who makes or repairs saddles.
meanings.sent1: The skilled saddlers crafted a beautiful leather saddle for the horse.
meanings.sent2: I visited the local saddlers to get my saddle fixed.
meanings.sent3: The saddlers had a race to see who could repair the most saddles in an hour.
meanings.sent4: Her hands moved like a saddlers', stitching the leather with precision.
meanings.sent5: The town's best saddlers were known for their attention to detail and quality work.

meanings.definition: A shop or business where saddles are made or sold.
meanings.sent1: We stopped by the saddlers to pick out a new saddle for the horse.
meanings.sent2: The saddlers on Main Street has been in business for over 50 years.
meanings.sent3: The saddlers had a big sale, and everyone rushed to buy new saddles.
meanings.sent4: The saddlers' shelves were filled with saddles of all colors and sizes.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the saddlers was like stepping into a world of leather craftsmanship.
